DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetic Drug-drug Interaction Safety Telmisartan/Amlodipine Rosuvastatin Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetic Drug-Drug ( telmisartan , amlodipine and/ rosuvastatin ) interaction safety healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer age 19 50 2 . Participant body weight > =55kg ( male ) body mass index ( BMI ) level 18~30 3 . Provision sign write informed consent 1 . History clinically significant disease 2 . History clinically significant hypersensitivity hypersensitivity reaction drug medication ( aspirin , antibiotic , etc . ) , include component Telmisartan , Rosuvastatin Amlodipine 3 . A history drug abuse presence positive reaction drug abuse potential urine screening drug 4 . Administration investigational product within 2 month prior first dose . 5 . Administration herbal medicine within 2 week administration ethical drug within 2 week administration overthecounter ( OTC ) drug within 1 week prior first dose investigational product ( investigator ( study doctor ) determine person meet criteria appropriately , relevant person may participate study ) 6 . Volunteers consider eligible clinical trial investigator ( study doctor ) due reason include laboratory test result , ECGs , vital sign .
